front.title: IEEE Standard on Video Techniques: Measurement of Resolution of Camera Systems, 1993 Techniques

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The methods for measuring the resolution of camera systems are described. The primary application is for users and manufacturers to quantify the limit where fine detail contained in the original image is no longer reproduced by the camera system. The techniques described may also be used for laboratory measurements and for proof-of-performance specifications for a camera.
